mapper.insert: INSERT INTO HOSPITALSCHEDULE (SEQ, HOSPITAL_SEQ, TITLE ,CONTENT, SCHEDULE, "CHECK", DELFLAG) VALUES(HOSPITALSCHEDULE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{hospital_seq}, #{title}, #{content}, #{schedule}, #{check}, 'N')
mapper.select: SELECT SEQ , HOSPITAL_SEQ , CONTENT , TITLE, SCHEDULE , "CHECK" , DELFLAG FROM HOSPITALSCHEDULE h WHERE HOSPITAL_SEQ = '3' AND DELFLAG = 'N' AND TO_CHAR(SCHEDULE,'YYYYMM') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM')

SELECT SEQ , HOSPITAL_SEQ , CONTENT , SCHEDULE , "CHECK" , DELFLAG FROM HOSPITALSCHEDULE h WHERE HOSPITAL_SEQ = #{hospital_seq} AND DELFLAG = 'N' AND TO_CHAR(SCHEDULE,'YYYYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')
SELECT SEQ , HOSPITAL_SEQ , TITLE, CONTENT , SCHEDULE , "CHECK" , DELFLAG FROM HOSPITALSCHEDULE h WHERE SEQ = '1' AND DELFLAG = 'N'
mapper.update: UPDATE HOSPITALSCHEDULE SET TITLE='젤리야 거긴행복하니', CONTENT='젤리님 영접하러 가는 날', SCHEDULE='2021-07-15', "CHECK"='Y' WHERE SEQ = 1
UPDATE HOSPITALSCHEDULE SET DELFLAG ='Y' WHERE SEQ ='1'
